metadata.name: Generate External Documentation
metadata.shortDescription: Generate comprehensive external documentation (MkDocs) from codebase analysis
metadata.description: Generates external documentation files (index.md, architecture.md, control-flow.md, use-cases.md, mkdocs.yml) using AWS Strands multi-agent system. Runs in spawn mode to allow parallel work. Output defaults to .olaf/data/product/documentations/<repo>/<folder>.
objectives: Accept root folder path for analysis (defaults to workspace root)
Determine output path based on repository name and root folder
Execute doc-external command via straf-cli in spawn mode
Allow user to continue working while documentation generates
Report completion status and file locations
metadata.author: OLAF Framework

prompts.name: generate-external-docs
prompts.description: Main prompt for external documentation generation

tools.name: spawn-doc-generator
tools.description: Spawn wrapper for background documentation generation

tools.name: check-doc-processes
tools.description: Check status of spawned documentation generation processes

tools.name: straf-cli
tools.description: AWS Strands CLI for multi-agent documentation generation
